import MethodEndpoint from '@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint';
import ParamsDetails from '@theme/ParamsDetails';
import RequestSchema from '@theme/RequestSchema';
import StatusCodes from '@theme/StatusCodes';
import OperationTabs from '@theme/OperationTabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import Heading from '@theme/Heading';

<Heading
  as={'h1'}
  className={'openapi__heading'}
  children={'getProjectDocument'}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'get'}
  path={'/api/v1/projects/{username}/{slug}/docs/{docId}'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

getProjectDocument

<Heading
  id={'request'}
  as={'h2'}
  className={'openapi-tabs__heading'}
  children={'Request'}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      schema: { type: 'string', example: 'johndoe', description: 'Username' },
      required: true,
      description: 'Username',
      name: 'username',
      in: 'path',
    },
    {
      schema: {
        type: 'string',
        example: 'my-novel',
        description: 'Project slug',
      },
      required: true,
      description: 'Project slug',
      name: 'slug',
      in: 'path',
    },
    {
      schema: {
        type: 'string',
        example: 'doc-123',
        description: 'Document ID',
      },
      required: true,
      description: 'Document ID',
      name: 'docId',
      in: 'path',
    },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema title={'Body'} body={undefined}></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '200': {
      description: 'Document metadata',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              id: {
                type: 'string',
                example: 'doc-123',
                description: 'Document ID',
              },
              name: {
                type: 'string',
                example: 'Chapter 1',
                description: 'Document name',
              },
              type: {
                type: 'string',
                example: 'ITEM',
                description: 'Document type',
              },
              createdAt: {
                type: 'string',
                example: '2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z',
                description: 'Creation timestamp',
              },
              updatedAt: {
                type: 'string',
                example: '2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z',
                description: 'Last update timestamp',
              },
            },
            required: ['id', 'name', 'type'],
            title: 'Document',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '401': {
      description: 'Not authenticated',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: {
                type: 'string',
                example: 'An error occurred',
                description: 'Error message',
              },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'DocumentError',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '404': {
      description: 'Document not found',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              error: {
                type: 'string',
                example: 'An error occurred',
                description: 'Error message',
              },
            },
            required: ['error'],
            title: 'DocumentError',
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
